text:
Emergence Capital | Partner Operations Manager | San Francisco, CA | ONSITE | Full-time

Zoom, Box, Salesforce, Yammer, Gusto.

Work with the team behind $100B+ in market cap. We're looking for a Partner Operations Manager (think of it like a Chief of Staff role) to work directly with our GPs, Kevin Spain and Joe Floyd.

See the full job description and apply here: https://medium.com/business-cloud/were-looking-for-a-partner...

If you have any questions, feel free to email careers@emcap.com. Thanks!
